prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon with sparkling pink features and a magical aura.
Imagine a mystical creature that combines elegance with a hint of gem-like attributes.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the beauty of diamonds and the grace of a dancer.
Make a character that represents both light and beauty in the Pokemon world.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon that glimmers and sparkles, captivating all who see it.
Show me a Pokemon that has a regal appearance and fairy-like charm.
Give me an enchanting Pokemon that thrives in magical forests and hidden groves.
